item.name: The Adventurers: The Temple of Chac
item.comment: Very fun game. I love the idea and mechanic of the game and components are superb. Unfortunately underplayed, because miniatures landed on "to be painted"... :(

item.name: Alien Frontiers
item.comment:
Very good dice management game, probably best I have ever played.
Rated 8 - 1 point because it was STRONGLY overplayed.

item.name: Alien Frontiers: Faction Pack #1
item.comment: Very good expansion, works great with Factions. However I prefer base game.

item.name: Alien Frontiers: Factions
item.comment: Very good expansion, adds another layer of complexity. However I prefer base game due to shorter game play.

item.name: Alien Frontiers: The Mind Control Helmet
item.comment: I always play with this card in base game.

item.name: Arcadia Quest
item.comment: I really like the game. ONLY Kickstarter that I missed, I wish I have backed!

item.name: Arcadia Quest: Beyond the Grave
item.comment: More of the same.

item.name: Arcana
item.comment: I really, really dislike the game. For me there is to little control over your deck/hand.

item.name: Archon: Glory & Machination
item.comment:
Rated after one game. I would love to play again since I enjoyed it.
One complaint: Board is really messy and hard to read.

item.name: Archon: Glory & Machination – Kickstarter Stretch Rewards
item.comment: Nice to have, but nothing compulsory.

item.name: Aye, Dark Overlord!
item.comment: Great party game, funny with nice illustrations. But gameplay depends mostly on playing people. With right people - games are always great and exciting, but with others they can be dull and boring.

item.name: BANG!
item.comment: Very good, quick filler. It has "one more time" effect and is highly addictive.

item.name: BANG! A Fistful of Cards
item.comment: Expansion is OK, but I prefer games with base game only. It's to chaotic for my taste.

item.name: Baronia
item.comment: A little meh, but maybe...

item.name: The Battle at Kemble's Cascade
item.comment:
Rated after one game. I would love to play again since I enjoyed it.
On complaint: Plastic trays for cards are really flimsy.

item.name: Betrayal at House on the Hill
item.comment:
Very good, light game with a traitor. Lot's of scenarios
Rated 9 - 1 because it was STRONGLY overplayed in our group.

item.name: Blokus
item.comment: To abstract for me. I enjoy it from time to time, but not very often.

item.name: Blood Bowl: Menedżer Drużyny – Gra Karciana
item.originalname: Blood Bowl: Team Manager – The Card Game
item.comment: Very light, easy and fun game. I like strategic choice and wacky randomnes.

item.name: Blood Bowl: Menedżer Drużyny – Nagła Śmierć
item.originalname: Blood Bowl: Team Manager – The Card Game – Sudden Death
item.comment: I always play with expansion.

item.name: Blood Rage
item.comment: Great game! Easy to learn, with dynamic and enjoyable game play. Definitely one of my favorites! And miniatures are simply outstanding!

item.name: Blood Rage: 5th Player Expansion
item.comment:
Probably I will never play Blood Rage with 5 players. But another clan is really cool! :D
Update: I played with 5 players and it was worst game of Blood Rage ever. Balance was ok, but somehow draft was random and it was impossible to have coherent strategy through the game. Maybe it was lonely case.

item.name: Blood Rage: 5th Player Expansion – Kickstarter Exclusives
item.comment: I always play with this expansion (additional monsters only).

item.name: Blood Rage: Kickstarter Exclusives
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Blueprints
item.comment: Fun game, great filler with some pleasing depth.

item.name: Boss Monster: Master of the Dungeon
item.originalname: Boss Monster: The Dungeon Building Card Game

item.name: Cadwallon: City of Thieves – A Gamble in the Dark
Cadwallon: City of Thieves – Cry Havoc!
Cadwallon: City of Thieves – The Inn
Champions of Midgard
item.comment: I thought that making climatic worker placement game is impossible, but here it is! At it's roots Champions of Midgaard is simple worker placement, with some random buildings, hidden goals and some dice rolling. But at the same time I find it very climatic and fitting to Viking theme. Think about it as Lords of Waterdeep, but with fitting theme you can feel in the game.

item.name: Chaos Marauders (second edition)
item.comment: Good game, but overcomplicated for sporadic games.

item.name: Chronicle
item.comment: Surprisingly fun game! Great filler and fun gameplay.

item.name: Colt Express
item.comment: I simply love this game. More than one way to win, stack mechanic, 3d train, simple but effective rules... I strongly recommend it.

item.name: Crokinole
item.comment: Easy to learn, hard to master. Great game to play and talk.

item.name: Crows
item.comment: Easy to learn, quick and fun to fill time after heavier games.

item.name: CV
item.comment: Easy game, plays very solitair like. It has potential to 'click', but not always.

item.name: Cytadela
item.comment: Rated: 7 - 1 because it was STRONGLY overplayed in our group

item.name: Cytadela: Mroczne miasto
item.comment: Expansion introduce dose of variety for Citadels but I prefer playing with base game only.

item.name: Dawno, dawno temu...
item.originalname: Once Upon a Time: The Storytelling Card Game
item.comment: Very good game, but only with correct group of people.

item.name: Descent: Wędrówki w mroku (Druga edycja)
item.originalname: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition)

item.name: Descent: Wędrówki w mroku (Druga edycja) – Kruczy Dwór
item.originalname: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Manor of Ravens

item.name: Descent: Wędrówki w mroku (Druga edycja) – Legowisko Jaszczura
item.originalname: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Lair of the Wyrm

item.name: Descent: Wędrówki w Mroku – Labirynt Zagłady
item.originalname: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – Labyrinth of Ruin

item.name: Descent: Wędrówki w Mroku – Trzęsawiska Trolli
item.originalname: Descent: Journeys in the Dark (Second Edition) – The Trollfens

item.name: Dixit
item.comment: Not really a game for me. I enjoy it from time to time, but there is to little game in this game.

item.name: Dixit Odyssey
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Dixit Odyssey: "Bunny" promo card
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Dobble
item.comment: Great, quick filler with simple rules! I strongly recommend it!

item.name: Dungeon Fighter
item.comment:
Great dexterity game! I strongly recommend this one! Would be 9 if not for rulebook.
NOTE: First edition/print

item.name: Dungeon Fighter: Black Sheep
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Dungeon Fighter: Fire at Will
item.comment: Great expansion for great game. I always play with it.

item.name: Dungeon Fighter: Marielle, the Mermaid
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Dungeon Fighter: Rock and Roll
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Dungeon Fighter: Ser Geek Bonus Card
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Dungeon Fighter: Stormy Winds
item.comment: Great expansion for great game. I always play with it.

item.name: Dungeon Fighter: The Big Wave
item.comment: Great expansion for great game. I always play with it.

item.name: Dungeon Roll
item.comment: Nice push your luck dungeon crawl.

item.name: Dungeon Roll Hero: Guild Leader
item.comment: Fun character to play but overpowered compared to base game characters. Balance with base game is really off.

item.name: Dungeon Roll: Hero Booster Pack #1
item.comment: Fun set of characters to play but overpowered compared to base game characters. Balance with base game is really off.

item.name: Dungeon Roll: Winter Heroes Pack
item.comment: Fun set of characters to play but overpowered compared to base game characters. Balance with base game is really off.

item.name: Eldritch Horror
item.comment: Great cooperative adventure game. Warning! Game play may take a lot of time.

item.name: Eldritch Horror: Zaginiona Wiedza
item.comment: Great expansion, adds to all most all decks from base game, I never play without it.

item.name: The Enigma of Leonardo: Quintis Fontis
Flash Point: Fire Rescue
item.comment: Great co-op game! Two sided board, interesting fire spreading mechanic, lot's of variation... I really like this game.

item.name: Flash Point: Fire Rescue – Dangerous Waters
item.comment: More of the same!

item.name: Flash Point: Fire Rescue – Extreme Danger
item.comment: More of the same!

item.name: Flash Point: Fire Rescue – Urban Structures
Gaja
item.comment: This game is true hit or miss. Some games are great, but other are so-so. I enjoy it from time to time.

item.name: Get Bit!
item.comment: Fun, but to abstract for me. Also potentially boring, because one player can die in 4th turn, and then he must wait looong time doing nothing.

item.name: Ghost Stories
item.comment: Nice coop game. A little step to start up, but once introduced to it is enjoyable experience.

item.name: Guilds of Cadwallon: 5 to 8 Player Expansion
item.comment: I never play with more than 4 people, but it works great as an altrnative color pieces.

item.name: Jamaica
item.comment: Stunning components and solid, easy to learn gameplay. Very fun game to play.

item.name: Jenga
item.comment: Classic dexterity game.

item.name: Kostki zostały rzucone!
item.comment: It's really, really random. I know that it's a dice game, and that dice games are random. But this is even more random. :)

item.name: Lords of Xidit
item.comment: Fun programming game. I really like it, but it's beyond my understanding, why, despite ton's of miniatures, player pieces are cardboard...

item.name: Lords of Xidit: Bonus Titans Promo
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Martwa Zima: Gra rozdroży
item.originalname: Dead of Winter: A Crossroads Game
item.comment: Very good cooperative game with traitor as an option. Good with 3 players, but shines with 4. Not as revolutionary as some would like to think, but nevertheless I like it.

item.name: Martwa Zima: Kodiak Colby
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Might & Magic Heroes: Crag Hack the Barbarian
item.comment: It's nice to have as an option, but I prefer playing with normal Heroes.

item.name: Might & Magic Heroes: Gra planszowa
item.comment: Great implementation of classic HoMM game. Unfortunately, exactly like it's pc predecessor game is very long :)

item.name: Mistfall
item.comment: KS, Essen 2015

item.name: Neuroshima Hex! Alabama Mercenaries
item.comment: As wit all small expansions for Neuroshima - It's nice to have, but I rarely play with it. Base game is just better without it.

item.name: Neuroshima Hex! Mad Bomber
item.comment: As wit all one-hex expansion for Neuroshima - It's nice to have, but I rarely play with it. Base game is just better without it.

item.name: Neuroshima Hex! Nocny Łowca
item.comment: As wit all one-hex expansion for Neuroshima - It's nice to have, but I rarely play with it. Base game is just better without it.

item.name: Neuroshima Hex! Zabójca
item.comment: As wit all one-hex expansion for Neuroshima - It's nice to have, but I rarely play with it. Base game is just better without it.

item.name: New York 1901
item.comment: Nice entry level game. Great quality, nice mechanics. Somehow reminds me of Ticket to Ride. I feel that I should like this game more, yet somehow I'm not.

item.name: Once Upon a Time: Dark Tales
item.comment: English edition.

item.name: Once Upon a Time: The Storytelling Card Game
item.comment: English edition.

item.name: Rallyman
item.comment: Great racing game, but only up to 3 players. With 4 players last player is waiting way to long for his turn and first player is waiting way to long for the end of the game.

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: Karty bestii
item.originalname: Robinson Crusoe: Adventure on the Cursed Island – Beast Cards
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: nowa postać – Marynarz
item.originalname: Robinson Crusoe: Adventure on the Cursed Island – Sailor character
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Robinson Crusoe: Przygoda na przeklętej wyspie
item.originalname: Robinson Crusoe: Adventures on the Cursed Island

item.name: Shadows over the Empire
item.comment: May be really broken at times, and I feel like random set up may make this game really unbalanced.

item.name: Shadows over the Empire: Azarias
item.comment: Nice to have, but don't improve base game issues.

item.name: Shadows over the Empire: Promo Pack
item.comment: Nice to have, but don't improve base game issues.

item.name: Sid Meier's Civilization: Gra Planszowa
item.originalname: Sid Meier's Civilization: The Board Game

item.name: Smash Up: Pretty Pretty Smash Up
Świat Dysku: Ankh-Morpork
item.comment: Solid worker placement/area control game. I like it very much.

item.name: Szalona Misja
item.comment: Great game! Although it looks wonky it's whacky and crazy :)

item.name: Taboo
item.comment: I'm generally not a fan of party games, but I tolerate this one ;-)

item.name: Tajemnicze Domostwo
item.comment: Great game with correct people. If you like Dixit, you'll like Mysterium.

item.name: Talisman (fourth edition)
item.comment: First re edition by Black Library.

item.name: Talisman: Magia i Miecz – Instruktor
item.comment: I always play with expansion.

item.name: Talisman: Magia i Miecz – Sobowtór
item.comment: I always play with expansion.

item.name: Tokaido
item.comment: Easy, smooth game. Very relaxing and not really demanding.

item.name: Tokaido: Eriku
item.comment: I always play with this expansion.

item.name: Tokaido: The New Encounters
item.comment: I always play with expansion.

item.name: Trio
item.comment:
Fun spot-it type of game.
WARNING! NOT FOR COLOURBLIND (at least polish edition :) )

item.name: Ucieczka: Świątynia zagłady
item.originalname: Escape: The Curse of the Temple
item.comment: Great real time game. I strongly recommend it.

item.name: The Undercity: An Iron Kingdoms Adventure Board Game
item.comment: Fun cooperative dungeon crawl. Board is ugly, but miniatures are quite nice (although scale creep is terrible). It has some clever AI mechanics for minions.

item.name: VivaJava Geekspansion
item.comment: I always play with expansion.

item.name: VivaJava: The Coffee Game
item.comment:
Very good game. Theme doesn't get me as much, but I lie playing it. Be aware: It's not 3 players game.
Intern expansion works, but for me it plays better with more players (and that's the main problem - finding players to play).

item.name: Warhammer: Inwazja – Marsz Potępionych
item.originalname: Warhammer: Invasion – March of the Damned

item.name: Wiochmen Rejser
item.comment: It's basically my firs board game ever. I played it countless times. Objectively it should be rated around 5-6, but for me it's 8 :)

item.name: The Witcher Adventure Game
item.comment:
I really, really wanted to like this game.
It's simple, but offers few strategies. I really like how every character is different and how all characters are balanced.
What kills this game for me is: 1. Gameplay length 2. Downtime
It may be house ruled, but I think that I prefer Eldritch Horror or even Talisman.

item.name: Wiz-War (eighth edition)
item.comment:
Nice duel-type game. Great components, but some of them (hats, counters) looks surprisingly dated.
Instruction may be a little to long, and some rules are quirki, but I like in-your-face aspect of the game and highly aggressive game play.
Great re playability.
May be a little to random at times.

item.name: Wsiąść do pociągu: Europa
item.comment:
I really like Tiket to Ride. Simple but not oversimplified rules, great intro game, beautiful components.
May take a little to long for what it is, but almost irreplaceable if you want to introduce someone to boardgames.

item.name: Zamki szalonego króla Ludwika
item.comment: It is ok game, works well and have some entertaining mechanics, but it's to long for what it is.

item.name: Zombicide: Black Plague
item.comment: Fun game with climatic rules. Base box is ok, but I wish that there would be more starting equipment and vault treasures. Gameplay is fun, quick and fluent. My only real gripe with the game is player elimination. I knew about it before buying and was ready for it, but it still hurts, specially early on.
